00020     // Plattform independent key codes and modifiers follow. 
00021     // The constants are borrowed from SDL.
00022     
00023     // Enumeration of valid key mods (possibly OR'd together).
00024     const long KEYMOD_NONE  = 0x0000;
00025     const long KEYMOD_LSHIFT= 0x0001;
00026     const long KEYMOD_RSHIFT= 0x0002;
00027     const long KEYMOD_LCTRL = 0x0040;
00028     const long KEYMOD_RCTRL = 0x0080;
00029     const long KEYMOD_LALT  = 0x0100;
00030     const long KEYMOD_RALT  = 0x0200;
00031     const long KEYMOD_LMETA = 0x0400;
00032     const long KEYMOD_RMETA = 0x0800;
00033     const long KEYMOD_NUM   = 0x1000;
00034     const long KEYMOD_CAPS  = 0x2000;
00035     const long KEYMOD_MODE  = 0x4000;
00036     const long KEYMOD_RESERVED = 0x8000;
00037 
00038     const long KEYMOD_CTRL    = (KEYMOD_LCTRL|KEYMOD_RCTRL);
00039     const long KEYMOD_SHIFT   = (KEYMOD_LSHIFT|KEYMOD_RSHIFT);
00040     const long KEYMOD_ALT     = (KEYMOD_LALT|KEYMOD_RALT);
00041     const long KEYMOD_META    = (KEYMOD_LMETA|KEYMOD_RMETA);
